content: super fashionable and functional this sturdy crochet tote is great for everyday use stitched in bernat maker pattern is worked in the round using half_double_crochet to create a sturdy base and handles with a fun mesh made in double_crochet and chain stitches you ll also learn single_crochet increases decreases tassels and more measuring approx 12 wide x 14 tall it s sure to become a go-to favorite materials bulky 5 bernat® maker™ 8 8 oz/250 g 317 yds/290 m aqua 14016 or clay 11008 1 ball or 270 yds/246 m measurements approx 12 30 5 cm wide x 14 35 5 cm long excluding handles
